abstract: Brian Mason, deputy clerk for Rowan County, Ky, submits legal filing to Federal Judge David L Bunning, expressing concerns about behavior of County Clerk Kim Davis; Mason tells judge he believes that Davis is not complying with court order prohibiting her from interfering with process of issuing marriage licenses to same-sex couples.
lead_paragraph: A deputy clerk in Rowan County raised questions about whether changes to marriage licenses, as ordered by the county’s clerk, complied with a federal judge’s orders.

headline.main: Deputy Clerk Questions Alterations to Kentucky Marriage Licenses

snippet: A deputy clerk in Rowan County raised questions about whether changes to marriage licenses, as ordered by the county’s clerk, complied with a federal judge’s orders.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
